00023 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LNET
00024 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00025 #include <lnet/lib-lnet.h>
00026 
00027 /* This is really lnet_proc.c. You might need to update sanity test 215
00028  * if any file format is changed. */
00029 
00030 static struct ctl_table_header *lnet_table_header = NULL;
00031 
00032 #define LNET_LOFFT_BITS         (sizeof(loff_t) * 8)
00033 /*
00034  * NB: max allowed LNET_CPT_BITS is 8 on 64-bit system and 2 on 32-bit system
00035  */
00036 #define LNET_PROC_CPT_BITS      (LNET_CPT_BITS + 1)
00037 /* change version, 16 bits or 8 bits */
00038 #define LNET_PROC_VER_BITS      MAX(((MIN(LNET_LOFFT_BITS, 64)) / 4), 8)
00039 
00040 #define LNET_PROC_HASH_BITS     LNET_PEER_HASH_BITS
00041 /*
00042  * bits for peer hash offset
00043  * NB: we don't use the highest bit of *ppos because it's signed
00044  */
00045 #define LNET_PROC_HOFF_BITS     (LNET_LOFFT_BITS -       \
00046                                  LNET_PROC_CPT_BITS -    \
00047                                  LNET_PROC_VER_BITS -    \
00048                                  LNET_PROC_HASH_BITS - 1)
00049 /* bits for hash index + position */
00050 #define LNET_PROC_HPOS_BITS     (LNET_PROC_HASH_BITS + LNET_PROC_HOFF_BITS)
00051 /* bits for peer hash table + hash version */
00052 #define LNET_PROC_VPOS_BITS     (LNET_PROC_HPOS_BITS + LNET_PROC_VER_BITS)
00053 
00054 #define LNET_PROC_CPT_MASK      ((1ULL << LNET_PROC_CPT_BITS) - 1)
00055 #define LNET_PROC_VER_MASK      ((1ULL << LNET_PROC_VER_BITS) - 1)
00056 #define LNET_PROC_HASH_MASK     ((1ULL << LNET_PROC_HASH_BITS) - 1)
00057 #define LNET_PROC_HOFF_MASK     ((1ULL << LNET_PROC_HOFF_BITS) - 1)
00058 
00059 #define LNET_PROC_CPT_GET(pos)                          \
00060         (int)(((pos) >> LNET_PROC_VPOS_BITS) & LNET_PROC_CPT_MASK)
00061 
00062 #define LNET_PROC_VER_GET(pos)                          \
00063         (int)(((pos) >> LNET_PROC_HPOS_BITS) & LNET_PROC_VER_MASK)
00064 
00065 #define LNET_PROC_HASH_GET(pos)                         \
00066         (int)(((pos) >> LNET_PROC_HOFF_BITS) & LNET_PROC_HASH_MASK)
00067 
00068 #define LNET_PROC_HOFF_GET(pos)                         \
00069         (int)((pos) & LNET_PROC_HOFF_MASK)
00070 
00071 #define LNET_PROC_POS_MAKE(cpt, ver, hash, off)         \
00072         (((((loff_t)(cpt)) & LNET_PROC_CPT_MASK) << LNET_PROC_VPOS_BITS) |   \
00073         ((((loff_t)(ver)) & LNET_PROC_VER_MASK) << LNET_PROC_HPOS_BITS) |   \
00074         ((((loff_t)(hash)) & LNET_PROC_HASH_MASK) << LNET_PROC_HOFF_BITS) | \
00075         ((off) & LNET_PROC_HOFF_MASK))
00076 
00077 #define LNET_PROC_VERSION(v)    ((unsigned int)((v) & LNET_PROC_VER_MASK))
00078 
00079 static int __proc_lnet_stats(void *data, int write,
00080                              loff_t pos, void __user *buffer, int nob)
00081 {
00082         int              rc;
00083         lnet_counters_t *ctrs;
00084         int              len;
00085         char            *tmpstr;
00086         const int        tmpsiz = 256; /* 7 %u and 4 LPU64 */
00087 
00088         if (write) {
00089                 lnet_counters_reset();
00090                 return 0;
00091         }
00092 
00093         /* read */
00094 
00095         LIBCFS_ALLOC(ctrs, sizeof(*ctrs));
00096         if (ctrs == NULL)
00097                 return -ENOMEM;
00098 
00099         LIBCFS_ALLOC(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00100         if (tmpstr == NULL) {
00101                 LIBCFS_FREE(ctrs, sizeof(*ctrs));
00102                 return -ENOMEM;
00103         }
00104 
00105         lnet_counters_get(ctrs);
00106 
00107         len = snprintf(tmpstr, tmpsiz,
00108                        "%u %u %u %u %u %u %u "LPU64" "LPU64" "
00109                        LPU64" "LPU64,
00110                        ctrs->msgs_alloc, ctrs->msgs_max,
00111                        ctrs->errors,
00112                        ctrs->send_count, ctrs->recv_count,
00113                        ctrs->route_count, ctrs->drop_count,
00114                        ctrs->send_length, ctrs->recv_length,
00115                        ctrs->route_length, ctrs->drop_length);
00116 
00117         if (pos >= min_t(int, len, strlen(tmpstr)))
00118                 rc = 0;
00119         else
00120                 rc = cfs_trace_copyout_string(buffer, nob,
00121                                               tmpstr + pos, "\n");
00122 
00123         LIBCFS_FREE(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00124         LIBCFS_FREE(ctrs, sizeof(*ctrs));
00125         return rc;
00126 }
00127 
00128 static int
00129 proc_lnet_stats(struct ctl_table *table, int write, void __user *buffer,
00130                 size_t *lenp, loff_t *ppos)
00131 {
00132         return lprocfs_call_handler(table->data, write, ppos, buffer, lenp,
00133                                     __proc_lnet_stats);
00134 }
00135 
00136 static int
00137 proc_lnet_routes(struct ctl_table *table, int write, void __user *buffer,
00138                  size_t *lenp, loff_t *ppos)
00139 {
00140         const int       tmpsiz = 256;
00141         char            *tmpstr;
00142         char            *s;
00143         int             rc = 0;
00144         int             len;
00145         int             ver;
00146         int             off;
00147 
00148         CLASSERT(sizeof(loff_t) >= 4);
00149 
00150         off = LNET_PROC_HOFF_GET(*ppos);
00151         ver = LNET_PROC_VER_GET(*ppos);
00152 
00153         LASSERT (!write);
00154 
00155         if (*lenp == 0)
00156                 return 0;
00157 
00158         LIBCFS_ALLOC(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00159         if (tmpstr == NULL)
00160                 return -ENOMEM;
00161 
00162         s = tmpstr; /* points to current position in tmpstr[] */
00163 
00164         if (*ppos == 0) {
00165                 s += snprintf(s, tmpstr + tmpsiz - s, "Routing %s\n",
00166                               the_lnet.ln_routing ? "enabled" : "disabled");
00167                 LASSERT (tmpstr + tmpsiz - s > 0);
00168 
00169                 s += snprintf(s, tmpstr + tmpsiz - s, "%-8s %4s %8s %7s %s\n",
00170                               "net", "hops", "priority", "state", "router");
00171                 LASSERT (tmpstr + tmpsiz - s > 0);
00172 
00173                 lnet_net_lock(0);
00174                 ver = (unsigned int)the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_version;
00175                 lnet_net_unlock(0);
00176                 *ppos = LNET_PROC_POS_MAKE(0, ver, 0, off);
00177         } else {
00178                 struct list_head        *n;
00179                 struct list_head        *r;
00180                 lnet_route_t            *route = NULL;
00181                 lnet_remotenet_t        *rnet  = NULL;
00182                 int                     skip  = off - 1;
00183                 struct list_head        *rn_list;
00184                 int                     i;
00185 
00186                 lnet_net_lock(0);
00187 
00188                 if (ver != LNET_PROC_VERSION(the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_version)) {
00189                         lnet_net_unlock(0);
00190                         LIBCFS_FREE(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00191                         return -ESTALE;
00192                 }
00193 
00194                 for (i = 0; i < LNET_REMOTE_NETS_HASH_SIZE && route == NULL;
00195                      i++) {
00196                         rn_list = &the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_hash[i];
00197 
00198                         n = rn_list->next;
00199 
00200                         while (n != rn_list && route == NULL) {
00201                                 rnet = list_entry(n, lnet_remotenet_t,
00202                                                   lrn_list);
00203 
00204                                 r = rnet->lrn_routes.next;
00205 
00206                                 while (r != &rnet->lrn_routes) {
00207                                         lnet_route_t *re =
00208                                                 list_entry(r, lnet_route_t,
00209                                                            lr_list);
00210                                         if (skip == 0) {
00211                                                 route = re;
00212                                                 break;
00213                                         }
00214 
00215                                         skip--;
00216                                         r = r->next;
00217                                 }
00218 
00219                                 n = n->next;
00220                         }
00221                 }
00222 
00223                 if (route != NULL) {
00224                         __u32        net        = rnet->lrn_net;
00225                         __u32 hops              = route->lr_hops;
00226                         unsigned int priority   = route->lr_priority;
00227                         lnet_nid_t   nid        = route->lr_gateway->lp_nid;
00228                         int          alive      = lnet_is_route_alive(route);
00229 
00230                         s += snprintf(s, tmpstr + tmpsiz - s,
00231                                       "%-8s %4u %8u %7s %s\n",
00232                                       libcfs_net2str(net), hops,
00233                                       priority,
00234                                       alive ? "up" : "down",
00235                                       libcfs_nid2str(nid));
00236                         LASSERT(tmpstr + tmpsiz - s > 0);
00237                 }
00238 
00239                 lnet_net_unlock(0);
00240         }
00241 
00242         len = s - tmpstr;     /* how many bytes was written */
00243 
00244         if (len > *lenp) {    /* linux-supplied buffer is too small */
00245                 rc = -EINVAL;
00246         } else if (len > 0) { /* wrote something */
00247                 if (copy_to_user(buffer, tmpstr, len))
00248                         rc = -EFAULT;
00249                 else {
00250                         off += 1;
00251                         *ppos = LNET_PROC_POS_MAKE(0, ver, 0, off);
00252                 }
00253         }
00254 
00255         LIBCFS_FREE(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00256 
00257         if (rc == 0)
00258                 *lenp = len;
00259 
00260         return rc;
00261 }
00262 
00263 static int
00264 proc_lnet_routers(struct ctl_table *table, int write, void __user *buffer,
00265                   size_t *lenp, loff_t *ppos)
00266 {
00267         int        rc = 0;
00268         char      *tmpstr;
00269         char      *s;
00270         const int  tmpsiz = 256;
00271         int        len;
00272         int        ver;
00273         int        off;
00274 
00275         off = LNET_PROC_HOFF_GET(*ppos);
00276         ver = LNET_PROC_VER_GET(*ppos);
00277 
00278         LASSERT (!write);
00279 
00280         if (*lenp == 0)
00281                 return 0;
00282 
00283         LIBCFS_ALLOC(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00284         if (tmpstr == NULL)
00285                 return -ENOMEM;
00286 
00287         s = tmpstr; /* points to current position in tmpstr[] */
00288 
00289         if (*ppos == 0) {
00290                 s += snprintf(s, tmpstr + tmpsiz - s,
00291                               "%-4s %7s %9s %6s %12s %9s %8s %7s %s\n",
00292                               "ref", "rtr_ref", "alive_cnt", "state",
00293                               "last_ping", "ping_sent", "deadline",
00294                               "down_ni", "router");
00295                 LASSERT(tmpstr + tmpsiz - s > 0);
00296 
00297                 lnet_net_lock(0);
00298                 ver = (unsigned int)the_lnet.ln_routers_version;
00299                 lnet_net_unlock(0);
00300                 *ppos = LNET_PROC_POS_MAKE(0, ver, 0, off);
00301         } else {
00302                 struct list_head *r;
00303                 struct lnet_peer *peer = NULL;
00304                 int               skip = off - 1;
00305 
00306                 lnet_net_lock(0);
00307 
00308                 if (ver != LNET_PROC_VERSION(the_lnet.ln_routers_version)) {
00309                         lnet_net_unlock(0);
00310 
00311                         LIBCFS_FREE(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00312                         return -ESTALE;
00313                 }
00314 
00315                 r = the_lnet.ln_routers.next;
00316 
00317                 while (r != &the_lnet.ln_routers) {
00318                         lnet_peer_t *lp = list_entry(r, lnet_peer_t,
00319                                                      lp_rtr_list);
00320 
00321                         if (skip == 0) {
00322                                 peer = lp;
00323                                 break;
00324                         }
00325 
00326                         skip--;
00327                         r = r->next;
00328                 }
00329 
00330                 if (peer != NULL) {
00331                         lnet_nid_t nid = peer->lp_nid;
00332                         cfs_time_t now = cfs_time_current();
00333                         cfs_time_t deadline = peer->lp_ping_deadline;
00334                         int nrefs     = peer->lp_refcount;
00335                         int nrtrrefs  = peer->lp_rtr_refcount;
00336                         int alive_cnt = peer->lp_alive_count;
00337                         int alive     = peer->lp_alive;
00338                         int pingsent  = !peer->lp_ping_notsent;
00339                         int last_ping = cfs_duration_sec(cfs_time_sub(now,
00340                                                      peer->lp_ping_timestamp));
00341                         int down_ni   = 0;
00342                         lnet_route_t *rtr;
00343 
00344                         if ((peer->lp_ping_feats &
00345                              LNET_PING_FEAT_NI_STATUS) != 0) {
00346                                 list_for_each_entry(rtr, &peer->lp_routes,
00347                                                     lr_gwlist) {
00348                                         /* downis on any route should be the
00349                                          * number of downis on the gateway */
00350                                         if (rtr->lr_downis != 0) {
00351                                                 down_ni = rtr->lr_downis;
00352                                                 break;
00353                                         }
00354                                 }
00355                         }
00356 
00357                         if (deadline == 0)
00358                                 s += snprintf(s, tmpstr + tmpsiz - s,
00359                                               "%-4d %7d %9d %6s %12d %9d %8s %7d %s\n",
00360                                               nrefs, nrtrrefs, alive_cnt,
00361                                               alive ? "up" : "down", last_ping,
00362                                               pingsent, "NA", down_ni,
00363                                               libcfs_nid2str(nid));
00364                         else
00365                                 s += snprintf(s, tmpstr + tmpsiz - s,
00366                                               "%-4d %7d %9d %6s %12d %9d %8lu %7d %s\n",
00367                                               nrefs, nrtrrefs, alive_cnt,
00368                                               alive ? "up" : "down", last_ping,
00369                                               pingsent,
00370                                               cfs_duration_sec(cfs_time_sub(deadline, now)),
00371                                               down_ni, libcfs_nid2str(nid));
00372                         LASSERT (tmpstr + tmpsiz - s > 0);
00373                 }
00374 
00375                 lnet_net_unlock(0);
00376         }
00377 
00378         len = s - tmpstr;     /* how many bytes was written */
00379 
00380         if (len > *lenp) {    /* linux-supplied buffer is too small */
00381                 rc = -EINVAL;
00382         } else if (len > 0) { /* wrote something */
00383                 if (copy_to_user(buffer, tmpstr, len))
00384                         rc = -EFAULT;
00385                 else {
00386                         off += 1;
00387                         *ppos = LNET_PROC_POS_MAKE(0, ver, 0, off);
00388                 }
00389         }
00390 
00391         LIBCFS_FREE(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00392 
00393         if (rc == 0)
00394                 *lenp = len;
00395 
00396         return rc;
00397 }
00398 
00399 static int
00400 proc_lnet_peers(struct ctl_table *table, int write, void __user *buffer,
00401                 size_t *lenp, loff_t *ppos)
00402 {
00403         const int               tmpsiz  = 256;
00404         struct lnet_peer_table  *ptable;
00405         char                    *tmpstr;
00406         char                    *s;
00407         int                     cpt  = LNET_PROC_CPT_GET(*ppos);
00408         int                     ver  = LNET_PROC_VER_GET(*ppos);
00409         int                     hash = LNET_PROC_HASH_GET(*ppos);
00410         int                     hoff = LNET_PROC_HOFF_GET(*ppos);
00411         int                     rc = 0;
00412         int                     len;
00413 
00414         CLASSERT(LNET_PROC_HASH_BITS >= LNET_PEER_HASH_BITS);
00415         LASSERT(!write);
00416 
00417         if (*lenp == 0)
00418                 return 0;
00419 
00420         if (cpt >= LNET_CPT_NUMBER) {
00421                 *lenp = 0;
00422                 return 0;
00423         }
00424 
00425         LIBCFS_ALLOC(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00426         if (tmpstr == NULL)
00427                 return -ENOMEM;
00428 
00429         s = tmpstr; /* points to current position in tmpstr[] */
00430 
00431         if (*ppos == 0) {
00432                 s += snprintf(s, tmpstr + tmpsiz - s,
00433                               "%-24s %4s %5s %5s %5s %5s %5s %5s %5s %s\n",
00434                               "nid", "refs", "state", "last", "max",
00435                               "rtr", "min", "tx", "min", "queue");
00436                 LASSERT (tmpstr + tmpsiz - s > 0);
00437 
00438                 hoff++;
00439         } else {
00440                 struct lnet_peer        *peer;
00441                 struct list_head        *p;
00442                 int                     skip;
00443  again:
00444                 p = NULL;
00445                 peer = NULL;
00446                 skip = hoff - 1;
00447 
00448                 lnet_net_lock(cpt);
00449                 ptable = the_lnet.ln_peer_tables[cpt];
00450                 if (hoff == 1)
00451                         ver = LNET_PROC_VERSION(ptable->pt_version);
00452 
00453                 if (ver != LNET_PROC_VERSION(ptable->pt_version)) {
00454                         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00455                         LIBCFS_FREE(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00456                         return -ESTALE;
00457                 }
00458 
00459                 while (hash < LNET_PEER_HASH_SIZE) {
00460                         if (p == NULL)
00461                                 p = ptable->pt_hash[hash].next;
00462 
00463                         while (p != &ptable->pt_hash[hash]) {
00464                                 lnet_peer_t *lp = list_entry(p, lnet_peer_t,
00465                                                              lp_hashlist);
00466                                 if (skip == 0) {
00467                                         peer = lp;
00468 
00469                                         /* minor optimization: start from idx+1
00470                                          * on next iteration if we've just
00471                                          * drained lp_hashlist */
00472                                         if (lp->lp_hashlist.next ==
00473                                             &ptable->pt_hash[hash]) {
00474                                                 hoff = 1;
00475                                                 hash++;
00476                                         } else {
00477                                                 hoff++;
00478                                         }
00479 
00480                                         break;
00481                                 }
00482 
00483                                 skip--;
00484                                 p = lp->lp_hashlist.next;
00485                         }
00486 
00487                         if (peer != NULL)
00488                                 break;
00489 
00490                         p = NULL;
00491                         hoff = 1;
00492                         hash++;
00493                 }
00494 
00495                 if (peer != NULL) {
00496                         lnet_nid_t nid       = peer->lp_nid;
00497                         int        nrefs     = peer->lp_refcount;
00498                         int        lastalive = -1;
00499                         char      *aliveness = "NA";
00500                         int        maxcr     = peer->lp_ni->ni_peertxcredits;
00501                         int        txcr      = peer->lp_txcredits;
00502                         int        mintxcr   = peer->lp_mintxcredits;
00503                         int        rtrcr     = peer->lp_rtrcredits;
00504                         int        minrtrcr  = peer->lp_minrtrcredits;
00505                         int        txqnob    = peer->lp_txqnob;
00506 
00507                         if (lnet_isrouter(peer) ||
00508                             lnet_peer_aliveness_enabled(peer))
00509                                 aliveness = peer->lp_alive ? "up" : "down";
00510 
00511                         if (lnet_peer_aliveness_enabled(peer)) {
00512                                 cfs_time_t     now = cfs_time_current();
00513                                 cfs_duration_t delta;
00514 
00515                                 delta = cfs_time_sub(now, peer->lp_last_alive);
00516                                 lastalive = cfs_duration_sec(delta);
00517 
00518                                 /* No need to mess up peers contents with
00519                                  * arbitrarily long integers - it suffices to
00520                                  * know that lastalive is more than 10000s old
00521                                  */
00522                                 if (lastalive >= 10000)
00523                                         lastalive = 9999;
00524                         }
00525 
00526                         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00527 
00528                         s += snprintf(s, tmpstr + tmpsiz - s,
00529                                       "%-24s %4d %5s %5d %5d %5d %5d %5d %5d %d\n",
00530                                       libcfs_nid2str(nid), nrefs, aliveness,
00531                                       lastalive, maxcr, rtrcr, minrtrcr, txcr,
00532                                       mintxcr, txqnob);
00533                         LASSERT (tmpstr + tmpsiz - s > 0);
00534 
00535                 } else { /* peer is NULL */
00536                         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00537                 }
00538 
00539                 if (hash == LNET_PEER_HASH_SIZE) {
00540                         cpt++;
00541                         hash = 0;
00542                         hoff = 1;
00543                         if (peer == NULL && cpt < LNET_CPT_NUMBER)
00544                                 goto again;
00545                 }
00546         }
00547 
00548         len = s - tmpstr;     /* how many bytes was written */
00549 
00550         if (len > *lenp) {    /* linux-supplied buffer is too small */
00551                 rc = -EINVAL;
00552         } else if (len > 0) { /* wrote something */
00553                 if (copy_to_user(buffer, tmpstr, len))
00554                         rc = -EFAULT;
00555                 else
00556                         *ppos = LNET_PROC_POS_MAKE(cpt, ver, hash, hoff);
00557         }
00558 
00559         LIBCFS_FREE(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00560 
00561         if (rc == 0)
00562                 *lenp = len;
00563 
00564         return rc;
00565 }
00566 
00567 static int __proc_lnet_buffers(void *data, int write,
00568                                loff_t pos, void __user *buffer, int nob)
00569 {
00570         char            *s;
00571         char            *tmpstr;
00572         int             tmpsiz;
00573         int             idx;
00574         int             len;
00575         int             rc;
00576         int             i;
00577 
00578         LASSERT(!write);
00579 
00580         /* (4 %d) * 4 * LNET_CPT_NUMBER */
00581         tmpsiz = 64 * (LNET_NRBPOOLS + 1) * LNET_CPT_NUMBER;
00582         LIBCFS_ALLOC(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00583         if (tmpstr == NULL)
00584                 return -ENOMEM;
00585 
00586         s = tmpstr; /* points to current position in tmpstr[] */
00587 
00588         s += snprintf(s, tmpstr + tmpsiz - s,
00589                       "%5s %5s %7s %7s\n",
00590                       "pages", "count", "credits", "min");
00591         LASSERT (tmpstr + tmpsiz - s > 0);
00592 
00593         if (the_lnet.ln_rtrpools == NULL)
00594                 goto out; /* I'm not a router */
00595 
00596         for (idx = 0; idx < LNET_NRBPOOLS; idx++) {
00597                 lnet_rtrbufpool_t *rbp;
00598 
00599                 lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00600                 cfs_percpt_for_each(rbp, i, the_lnet.ln_rtrpools) {
00601                         s += snprintf(s, tmpstr + tmpsiz - s,
00602                                       "%5d %5d %7d %7d\n",
00603                                       rbp[idx].rbp_npages,
00604                                       rbp[idx].rbp_nbuffers,
00605                                       rbp[idx].rbp_credits,
00606                                       rbp[idx].rbp_mincredits);
00607                         LASSERT(tmpstr + tmpsiz - s > 0);
00608                 }
00609                 lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00610         }
00611 
00612  out:
00613         len = s - tmpstr;
00614 
00615         if (pos >= min_t(int, len, strlen(tmpstr)))
00616                 rc = 0;
00617         else
00618                 rc = cfs_trace_copyout_string(buffer, nob,
00619                                               tmpstr + pos, NULL);
00620 
00621         LIBCFS_FREE(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00622         return rc;
00623 }
00624 
00625 static int
00626 proc_lnet_buffers(struct ctl_table *table, int write, void __user *buffer,
00627                   size_t *lenp, loff_t *ppos)
00628 {
00629         return lprocfs_call_handler(table->data, write, ppos, buffer, lenp,
00630                                     __proc_lnet_buffers);
00631 }
00632 
00633 static int
00634 proc_lnet_nis(struct ctl_table *table, int write, void __user *buffer,
00635               size_t *lenp, loff_t *ppos)
00636 {
00637         int     tmpsiz = 128 * LNET_CPT_NUMBER;
00638         int        rc = 0;
00639         char      *tmpstr;
00640         char      *s;
00641         int        len;
00642 
00643         LASSERT (!write);
00644 
00645         if (*lenp == 0)
00646                 return 0;
00647 
00648         LIBCFS_ALLOC(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00649         if (tmpstr == NULL)
00650                 return -ENOMEM;
00651 
00652         s = tmpstr; /* points to current position in tmpstr[] */
00653 
00654         if (*ppos == 0) {
00655                 s += snprintf(s, tmpstr + tmpsiz - s,
00656                               "%-24s %6s %5s %4s %4s %4s %5s %5s %5s\n",
00657                               "nid", "status", "alive", "refs", "peer",
00658                               "rtr", "max", "tx", "min");
00659                 LASSERT (tmpstr + tmpsiz - s > 0);
00660         } else {
00661                 struct list_head  *n;
00662                 lnet_ni_t         *ni   = NULL;
00663                 int                skip = *ppos - 1;
00664 
00665                 lnet_net_lock(0);
00666 
00667                 n = the_lnet.ln_nis.next;
00668 
00669                 while (n != &the_lnet.ln_nis) {
00670                         lnet_ni_t *a_ni = list_entry(n, lnet_ni_t, ni_list);
00671 
00672                         if (skip == 0) {
00673                                 ni = a_ni;
00674                                 break;
00675                         }
00676 
00677                         skip--;
00678                         n = n->next;
00679                 }
00680 
00681                 if (ni != NULL) {
00682                         struct lnet_tx_queue    *tq;
00683                         char    *stat;
00684                         long    now = cfs_time_current_sec();
00685                         int     last_alive = -1;
00686                         int     i;
00687                         int     j;
00688 
00689                         if (the_lnet.ln_routing)
00690                                 last_alive = now - ni->ni_last_alive;
00691 
00692                         /* @lo forever alive */
00693                         if (ni->ni_lnd->lnd_type == LOLND)
00694                                 last_alive = 0;
00695 
00696                         lnet_ni_lock(ni);
00697                         LASSERT(ni->ni_status != NULL);
00698                         stat = (ni->ni_status->ns_status ==
00699                                 LNET_NI_STATUS_UP) ? "up" : "down";
00700                         lnet_ni_unlock(ni);
00701 
00702                         /* we actually output credits information for
00703                          * TX queue of each partition */
00704                         cfs_percpt_for_each(tq, i, ni->ni_tx_queues) {
00705                                 for (j = 0; ni->ni_cpts != NULL &&
00706                                      j < ni->ni_ncpts; j++) {
00707                                         if (i == ni->ni_cpts[j])
00708                                                 break;
00709                                 }
00710 
00711                                 if (j == ni->ni_ncpts)
00712                                         continue;
00713 
00714                                 if (i != 0)
00715                                         lnet_net_lock(i);
00716 
00717                                 s += snprintf(s, tmpstr + tmpsiz - s,
00718                                       "%-24s %6s %5d %4d %4d %4d %5d %5d %5d\n",
00719                                       libcfs_nid2str(ni->ni_nid), stat,
00720                                       last_alive, *ni->ni_refs[i],
00721                                       ni->ni_peertxcredits,
00722                                       ni->ni_peerrtrcredits,
00723                                       tq->tq_credits_max,
00724                                       tq->tq_credits, tq->tq_credits_min);
00725                                 if (i != 0)
00726                                         lnet_net_unlock(i);
00727                         }
00728                         LASSERT(tmpstr + tmpsiz - s > 0);
00729                 }
00730 
00731                 lnet_net_unlock(0);
00732         }
00733 
00734         len = s - tmpstr;     /* how many bytes was written */
00735 
00736         if (len > *lenp) {    /* linux-supplied buffer is too small */
00737                 rc = -EINVAL;
00738         } else if (len > 0) { /* wrote something */
00739                 if (copy_to_user(buffer, tmpstr, len))
00740                         rc = -EFAULT;
00741                 else
00742                         *ppos += 1;
00743         }
00744 
00745         LIBCFS_FREE(tmpstr, tmpsiz);
00746 
00747         if (rc == 0)
00748                 *lenp = len;
00749 
00750         return rc;
00751 }
00752 
00753 struct lnet_portal_rotors {
00754         int             pr_value;
00755         const char      *pr_name;
00756         const char      *pr_desc;
00757 };
00758 
00759 static struct lnet_portal_rotors        portal_rotors[] = {
00760         {
00761                 .pr_value = LNET_PTL_ROTOR_OFF,
00762                 .pr_name  = "OFF",
00763                 .pr_desc  = "Turn off message rotor for wildcard portals"
00764         },
00765         {
00766                 .pr_value = LNET_PTL_ROTOR_ON,
00767                 .pr_name  = "ON",
00768                 .pr_desc  = "round-robin dispatch all PUT messages for "
00769                             "wildcard portals"
00770         },
00771         {
00772                 .pr_value = LNET_PTL_ROTOR_RR_RT,
00773                 .pr_name  = "RR_RT",
00774                 .pr_desc  = "round-robin dispatch routed PUT message for "
00775                             "wildcard portals"
00776         },
00777         {
00778                 .pr_value = LNET_PTL_ROTOR_HASH_RT,
00779                 .pr_name  = "HASH_RT",
00780                 .pr_desc  = "dispatch routed PUT message by hashing source "
00781                             "NID for wildcard portals"
00782         },
00783         {
00784                 .pr_value = -1,
00785                 .pr_name  = NULL,
00786                 .pr_desc  = NULL
00787         },
00788 };
00789 
00790 static int __proc_lnet_portal_rotor(void *data, int write,
00791                                     loff_t pos, void __user *buffer, int nob)
00792 {
00793         const int       buf_len = 128;
00794         char            *buf;
00795         char            *tmp;
00796         int             rc;
00797         int             i;
00798 
00799         LIBCFS_ALLOC(buf, buf_len);
00800         if (buf == NULL)
00801                 return -ENOMEM;
00802 
00803         if (!write) {
00804                 lnet_res_lock(0);
00805 
00806                 for (i = 0; portal_rotors[i].pr_value >= 0; i++) {
00807                         if (portal_rotors[i].pr_value == portal_rotor)
00808                                 break;
00809                 }
00810 
00811                 LASSERT(portal_rotors[i].pr_value == portal_rotor);
00812                 lnet_res_unlock(0);
00813 
00814                 rc = snprintf(buf, buf_len,
00815                               "{\n\tportals: all\n"
00816                               "\trotor: %s\n\tdescription: %s\n}",
00817                               portal_rotors[i].pr_name,
00818                               portal_rotors[i].pr_desc);
00819 
00820                 if (pos >= min_t(int, rc, buf_len)) {
00821                         rc = 0;
00822                 } else {
00823                         rc = cfs_trace_copyout_string(buffer, nob,
00824                                         buf + pos, "\n");
00825                 }
00826                 goto out;
00827         }
00828 
00829         rc = cfs_trace_copyin_string(buf, buf_len, buffer, nob);
00830         if (rc < 0)
00831                 goto out;
00832 
00833         tmp = cfs_trimwhite(buf);
00834 
00835         rc = -EINVAL;
00836         lnet_res_lock(0);
00837         for (i = 0; portal_rotors[i].pr_name != NULL; i++) {
00838                 if (strncasecmp(portal_rotors[i].pr_name, tmp,
00839                                 strlen(portal_rotors[i].pr_name)) == 0) {
00840                         portal_rotor = portal_rotors[i].pr_value;
00841                         rc = 0;
00842                         break;
00843                 }
00844         }
00845         lnet_res_unlock(0);
00846 out:
00847         LIBCFS_FREE(buf, buf_len);
00848         return rc;
00849 }
00850 
00851 static int
00852 proc_lnet_portal_rotor(struct ctl_table *table, int write, void __user *buffer,
00853                        size_t *lenp, loff_t *ppos)
00854 {
00855         return lprocfs_call_handler(table->data, write, ppos, buffer, lenp,
00856                                     __proc_lnet_portal_rotor);
00857 }

00910 static struct ctl_table top_table[] = {
00911         {
00912                 INIT_CTL_NAME
00913                 .procname       = "lnet",
00914                 .mode           = 0555,
00915                 .data           = NULL,
00916                 .maxlen         = 0,
00917                 .child          = lnet_table,
00918         },
00919         { 0 }
00920 };
00921 
00922 void
00923 lnet_proc_init(void)
00924 {
00925 #ifdef CONFIG_SYSCTL
00926         if (lnet_table_header == NULL)
00927                 lnet_table_header = register_sysctl_table(top_table);
00928 #endif
00929 }
00930 
00931 void
00932 lnet_proc_fini(void)
00933 {
00934 #ifdef CONFIG_SYSCTL
00935         if (lnet_table_header != NULL)
00936                 unregister_sysctl_table(lnet_table_header);
00937 
00938         lnet_table_header = NULL;
00939 #endif
00940 }
